email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can lower the freight rate to $51.00 per ton, which I believe is competitive given the current market. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 per ton sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Please confirm the laycan of October 15-20 and the demurrage rate of $15,000 per day. Also, could you send over the charter party agreement for review? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. I confirm the laycan is October 15-20 and the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day. I will send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if there are any other details you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. I have reviewed the charter party agreement and everything looks in order. We are ready to proceed. Please let me know the next steps. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent. I will finalize the booking and send you the confirmation shortly. Thank you for your cooperation and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
